document.full_text: the nfl network is the first of the league-owned cable channels to cover a labor dispute involving itself, raising the question of how much journalistic freedom it can have.
document.title: in lockout, a close eye falls on the nfl network
lines_and_colors: the nfl network is the first of the league-owned cable channels to cover a labor dispute involving itself, raising the question of how much journalistic freedom it can have.
